subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Patriots thrashed the Redskins on Sunday to improve to 8-0 and set up one of the most eagerly anticipated regular-season games in at least a decade against the Colts.
snippet: The Patriots thrashed the Redskins on Sunday to improve to 8-0 and set up one of the most eagerly anticipated regular-season games in at least a decade against the Colts.
